snippet: American Dance Machine for the 21st Century, a repertory company for musical-theater dance, made its debut at the Joyce Theater on Tuesday.
abstract: Brian Seibert reviews debut performance by the American Dance Machine for the 21st Century, at the Joyce Theater.
